name: Zoom
description: Zoom API integration for managing meetings, users, and recordings.

permissions.name: Manage Meetings
permissions.description: Allows creating, updating, and deleting meetings.

operations.name: Get User Information
operations.description: Retrieves information for the current authenticated user.

operations.name: Create Meeting
operations.description: Creates a new meeting for a user.

operations.name: List Meetings
operations.description: Lists all meetings for a user.

operations.name: Get Meeting Details
operations.description: Retrieves the details of a specific meeting.

operations.name: List Recordings
operations.description: List all recordings for the authenticated user.
